description: eProject Builder (ePB) is a secure, web-based system that enables agencies and ESCOs to securely: (1) preserve, track, and access energy project information for the life of the contract (2) quickly generate data and reports for their portfolio of projects (3) develop project scenarios using standardized amortization calculations (4) benchmark new projects against historical project data
name: eProject Builder (ePB) v3.1

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
